snippet: There is no shortage of companies trying to dominate the nascent mobile payment industry, but consumers have yet to be won over.
abstract: There is no shortage of companies trying to dominate the nascent mobile payment industry, but they face the challenge of convincing people that paying with a phone is safer and more convenient than using cash or a credit card; mobile payment start-up Square's partnership with Starbucks will give more exposure to the new system.
lead_paragraph: There is no shortage of companies trying to dominate the nascent mobile payment industry, but consumers have yet to be won over.

headline.seo: The Campaign to Digitize Your Wallet Is Intensifying
headline.main: The Campaign to Digitize Your Wallet Is Intensifying
headline.print_headline: The Campaign to Digitize Your Wallet Is Intensifying
